text: hey guys I'm Alex thanks for clicking

remember a gerund is basically a verb

ing and it's a thing it acts like a noun
so the first one I appreciate you coming
here now what this needs you have to

ing verb and is this alright I
appreciate you coming coming as the

here is try and think about this
logically
what do you appreciate and here you have
I appreciate you and you have coming

here you say I appreciate your your

resents he resents the action not the

grammatically these are correct

native speakers themselves make this
